page.title: 07WEST COKER AREA EMPLOYMENT
page.content: SERVICE INDUSTRIES THERE ARE TWO GARAGES IN WEST COKER AND EAST CHINNOCK EMPLOYING 8 PEOPLE.SEVETEEN EMPLOYED IN SHOPS,ONE POLICE MAN,ONE POST WOMAN. HOTELS,INNS AND PUBLIC HOUSES EMPLOY 56 PEOPLE,MOSTLY PART TIME. THE VILLAGE SCHOOL,AT WEST COKER EMPLOYS 9 PEOPLE_ ONE HEAD TEACHER,2 ASSISTANT,AND ONE PART TIME TEACHER.1 CLASSROOM ASSISTANT,1 LUNCH TIME SUPERVISOR,2 DINNING ROOM ASSISTANTS,AND 1 CARETAKER. 12 MEN ARE CURRENTLY EMPLOYED ON A LOCAL BUILDING SITE. THERE ARE 3 SMALL BUILDING FIRMS EMPLOYING 10 PEOPLE. THERE IS ONE SELF EMPLOYED ELECTRICIAN, 1 SELF EMPLOYED CARPENTER, AN ARCHITECT, A PART TIME BALLET TEACHER,AND AN ARTIST SPECIALIZING IN GAME BIRD PICTURES.
